name: THIS IS THE HUNGER OF BEARS/PT.EP Combo
description: NOTE: We are out of physical copies of "This is the Hunger of Bears" so we can only burn you a cdr. We have dropped the price because of that. The debut album featuring 11 Thwompin’ tracks! 1. When My Horns Meet Your Face 2. All Day Grillet 3. Falling Buildings Falling Down 4. Pilot Wings 64 5. HEY ZEUS! GET OUTTA JUPITER! 6. Hardcore Pattycakin’ 7. Not Today MEGATRON!!! 8. Noise Sandwich! 9. Cadillac Shrimpin’ 10. Jack and Jill Went Up The Hill (to kill kill KILL!!) 11. Captain Buffet FREE SHIPPING We will also give you a free copy of our new EP "PT.EP".

name: PT.EP
description:
1. Obligatory Multi-Part Song Pt. 3
2. Pt. 2 (The Prequel)
3. Pt. Chicago Pt. Vocabulary
4. Pt. Bat Pt. Owl or Pt. Hot Pocket Pt. Landmine

All 4 tracks will be distributed on a super cool CD-R. 

Oh yea, and if you order "This Is The Hunger of Bears" you we'll give you a copy of PT.EP for FREE! So do yourself a favor and just buy that cd instead of this one. Its only another 3 bucks.
